articles.title: Roy Williams, Jim Calhoun among five coaches headed to College Basketball Hall of Fame
articles.description: Five coaches -- Roy Williams, Jim Calhoun, John Beilein, Lon Kruger and Jerry Krause -- have been named to the National College Basketball Hall of Fame along with former players Richard Hamilton, Larry Miller and Frank Selvy.

articles.title: Sources - NBA salary cap for 2022-23 projected to increase to $123.6M
articles.description: The NBA salary cap number for next season, which will be finalized by the start of the league year Thursday, is projected to increase to $123.6 million.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- The NBA's salary cap for the 2022-23 season is projected to come in at roughly $123.6 million, sources told ESPN, an $11.6 million increase from last season's $112 million figure.
